ygData.subject: Bloodmoon
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone have one of these. Or better yet, am I quoting the wrong name. Its a 1h slasher found in Plane of Hate. I am not sure, I KNOW there is a DE/HU 1h
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone have one of these.
Or better yet, am I quoting the wrong name.
Its a 1h slasher found in Plane of Hate.
I am not sure, I KNOW there is a DE/HU 1h slasher there, just not sure what/who has it.
I thought maybe Ashenbone Drakes, but I have also heard Innoruuk. Killed like 12 drakes and 1 god so far, not seen one. Just trying to home on it, so if you hear something let me know. Btw the shield I received in there is ac 25 (adds 40), 5 STA and 100 hps. Looks like a modifided cracked darkwood. I will post SS tomorrow. Thanks guys and any info would help.
-Metreus Del Sangre
Level 50 DE SK Innoruuk
